doc.title: Four Ladies in a Bind

credit.role: Bound Poker Player/Burglarized Woman/Bound Secret Agent

doc.plot: In this third bondage video from co-directors Eric Holman and Eliot Shear, four lovely ladies are engaged in a hotly-contested card game when Whitney Prescott and Francesca Le are caught cheating. The punishment? Bondage, of course. While the two buxom beauties struggle against their bonds, Morgan Phoenix grabs, binds and gags Isadora Rhodes, planning to make off with the entire jackpot. Before the blonde bombshell can make a getaway, her erstwhile partner makes an inopportune appearance, hogties Morgan and makes off with the proceeds. Additional vignettes featuring Morgan as a tied-up secretary, Catharine Beaumont as a damsel-in-distress tied and muzzled in a dungeon, Whitney Prescott as a kidnapped beauty queen and Francesca Le as an inept secret agent.
